short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adjusts sageOne Accounting dashboard graph widgets so you can view more information

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This little app adjusts the dashboard graph widgets in the sageOne Accounting platform so you can view more information instead of it cutting off information. That is all this application currently does. It only works on the sageOne Accounting dashboard and no information is collected or stored. This application is not official software.
